price: Barang siapa yang menghendaki pahala di dunia saja (maka ia merugi), karena di sisi Allah ada pahala dunia dan akhirat.  Dan Allah Maha Mendengar lagi Maha Melihat.
arabic: مَّن كَانَ يُرِيدُ ثَوَابَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا فَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ ثَوَابُ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَٱلۡأٓخِرَةِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ سَمِيعَۢا بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yurīdu thawāba al-dun'yā faʿinda al-lahi thawābu al-dun'yā wal-ākhirati wakāna al-lahu samīʿan baṣīran
